body: Hi Giuseppe, In the newer versions of Honeybee the geometry check is added so you shouldn't be worried about it ([https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/blob/master/src/Honeyb...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/blob/master/src/Honeybee_Run%20Daylight%20Simulation.py#L110-L115)). For now you canuse Grasshopper components to remove the surfaces, either by counting the number of vertices or the area of surfaces: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1-cWLp9Glp-uCGp7gNWCAIQHukIx0f0VvVTR5RTXc9qtxlZkDti75eDE*xwMi4BH-eZ9RjRBXELPqInIBhzDJp1Kcyd7*sX3/findProblematicBrep.png)
